ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date the immunization recommendation was created.

ivardefs.name: dateCriterion_
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine date recommendations.  For example, earliest date to administer, latest date to administer, etc.

ivardefs.name: doseNumber
ivardefs.desc: The next recommended dose number (e.g. dose 2 is the next recommended dose).

ivardefs.name: protocol
ivardefs.desc: Contains information about the protocol under which the vaccine was administered.

ivardefs.name: supportingImmunization_
ivardefs.desc: Immunization event history that supports the status and recommendation.

ivardefs.name: supportingPatientInformation_
ivardefs.desc: Patient Information that supports the status and recommendation.  This includes patient observations, adverse reactions and allergy/intolerance information.

ivardefs.name: targetDisease
ivardefs.desc: The targeted disease for the recommendation.

ivardefs.name: vaccineCode
ivardefs.desc: Vaccine that pertains to the recommendation.
